Hero.title: A new hope against HIV: AI and human support for safe and private care
Hero.subtitle: My name is Joshua Hernandez, and I'm developing a mobile app to provide confidential guidance for HIV prevention, detection, and treatment. Your contribution can help save lives.

About.title: What We Need & What You Get
About.subtitle: We are seeking ${goal} to develop and launch the first version of VIHTal Companion.

Funding.title: Join the Campaign
Funding.subtitle: Your contribution, big or small, will make a tangible impact.
Funding.disclaimer: Even if we don’t reach the full goal, your contribution will still help fund critical components.

founder.name: Founder's Circle
perks: Personal thank-you note from the founder

EarlyAccess.title: Get Early Access to Premium Features
EarlyAccess.description: As a special thank you to our campaign supporters, all donors will receive exclusive early access to our premium features before they are released to the public. Be the first to experience the full power of VIHTal Companion and help shape its future.

Impact.title: The Impact You'll Make
Impact.description: Your support will make a real difference. VIHTal Companion is an innovative solution combining AI-driven guidance, human support, and gamified tools—a first for Venezuela and Latin America. By contributing, you help improve health outcomes, empower individuals, and reduce HIV stigma where it's needed most.

safe.title: Safe & Accessible
safe.description: Provide a secure and empathetic platform for people to get accurate HIV information.

empower.title: Empower Individuals
empower.description: Enable users to track medication adherence and take control of their health journey.

community.title: Build Community
community.description: Connect users with supportive communities to reduce stigma and isolation.

Impact.storyFallback: The community has high hopes for this project. Access to reliable information and support is crucial for those affected by HIV in Venezuela. This app promises to be a lifeline.
